title: Humana
shortDescription: National health insurer offering various plan types with autism service coverage.
description: Humana is a major national health insurance company offering plans through employers, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid managed care, and individual markets in Florida. Humana plans typically include coverage for autism spectrum disorder services including behavioral health, ABA therapy, speech therapy, and occupational therapy. Coverage specifics vary by plan type, so verifying your particular benefits is important.
requirements: Prior authorization typically required for ABA

links.label: Humana
links.description: Official Humana website - find providers and manage your plan
